Message.Title: WOW did you know?????
Message.Msg: The average Mexican drinks more Coke products than the average American, British, Indian, and Chinese combined
Don't drink Coke if you are so worried about its effects. Do you smoke cigarettes, joints, or snort cocaine? These are likely to be more deleterious to your health.

The problem is today to many people live a sedentary life. I see kids that should be exercising and they are eating or drinking soda. If they had to work like my brothers and sisters did when we were you they wouldn't be fat.
